title: About
text: This site presents weekly operational reports for DECC. Each post renders from a consistent template and week-specific data snapshots to ensure reproducibility.

title: DECC Weekly Reports
text:
Welcome to the DECC weekly reporting site. Browse prior weeks and current analyses.

View the full list of weekly reports on the Reports page.
